issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Per https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-MAPREDUCE-Build/5388//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshadoop-sls.html,  there are 13 warnings to be fixed.

comments.body: [~ajisakaa] thanks for reporting this jira..Attached patch. Kindly review the same,,SE_BAD_FIELD erros want to add in exclude.xml since those are maps but fixed ( let me know your thought on this,..)..

{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12724978/HADOOP-11821.patch
  against trunk revision 174d8b3.

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:red}-1 tests included{color}.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.
